body.contents: Choose wisely as this decision cannot be changed without traveling to far away dimensions!

actions.label: Human
actions.tooltip: Newest soul to the realms. Feels familiar.

actions.label: Faefolk
actions.tooltip: Elegant and wise. Born from stars, wrapped in silk, and baptized by moonlight.

actions.label: Dweller
actions.tooltip: Deep beneath the mountains, the roar of forges and songs of ages past echo still.

actions.label: Outlander
actions.tooltip: Survivors of an ancient Armageddon. Nomads in every realm but belonging to none.

actions.label: Nereid
actions.tooltip: Queens and kings of the ocean, wearing crowns of kelp and coral.

actions.label: Hunter
actions.tooltip: Becoming what they eat. By claws, by beak, by teeth.

actions.label: Automech
actions.tooltip: Body of iron. Heart of gold.

actions.label: Netherkin
actions.tooltip: Flesh in flame, passion and pain.

actions.label: Frostkin
actions.tooltip: Snow upon footprints. Soldiers of a fallen empire frozen in time.

actions.label: Realmkeeper
actions.tooltip: Ageless guardians of peace from the realm of everlasting light.

actions.label: Villain
actions.tooltip: Counted missing from the great cosmic prison. Ruthlessly hunted. Freer than most.

actions.label: Enderling
actions.tooltip: Judge a book by its ending.
